Detailed Description

This file defines the utils functions used by CPU Idle API.

Function Documentation

void PmlibDoWFI ( void  )

Execute WFI instruction to invoke M3 to put a8 into idle.

This function is called by CPU Idle API to execute WFI.

none
Returns
